actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a study to determine the effects of age upon service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a study to determine the adverse effects of the aging process upon service connected disabilities and the extent to which such effects should be a factor in determining disability evaluations and/or disability compensation payments. Requires that such report be submitted to Congress not later than 90 days following the convening of the Ninety-fifth Congress.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to conduct a study to determine the effects of age upon service-connected disabilities.
